remarks: A substitution applied to an expression.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
msubffval.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
msubffval.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
msubffval.s $e |- S = ( mSubst ` T ) $.
msubffval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
msubffval.o $e |- O = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
msubrsub $p |- ( ( F : A --> R /\ A C_ V /\ X e. E ) -> ( 2nd ` ( ( S ` F ) ` X ) ) = ( ( O ` F ) ` ( 2nd ` X ) ) ) $.
